sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Smokeless Tobacco Outdoor Advertising Act.

sections.heading: As used in this Act, "smokeless tobacco" means any loose,
sections.text:
cut, shredded, ground, powdered, compressed or leaf tobacco that is intended
to be placed in the mouth without being smoked.

sections.heading: All outdoor billboard advertisement for smokeless tobacco
sections.text: shall bear one of the following statements:
